text: Alkalibacillus filiformis is a Gram-positive, haloalkaliphilic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Alkalibacillus which has been isolated from water and mud from Malvizza, Montecalvo Irpino, Italy. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Alkalibacillus filiformis
